Northern Ireland

Seabird from 1958

Two fire-tube boilers,

Armament:
1 × 4-inch BL Mk.IX gun
2 × 0.5-inch (12.7 mm) twin machine guns
2 × 0.303-inch (7.7-mm) Lewis machine guns
